title: Finisher icons
body: I know the icons that give you finishers in game are for events and stuff but I think it would make League a little more fun if we got to keep the finishers every time we use certain icons instead of waiting for every time there is an event to be able to see them in game

replies.body:
The reason they gave for not keeping it (when they released the first ones for URF) is that they interfere quite a bit with gameplay clarity. They said they might be able to compromise but never spoke up about it again.

My suggestion to them is to enable it in all modes, but give visual options to disable other players' finishers or disable all of them (default). Then it's up to the players to decide if they want to see them or not.
Yeah choosing too see them or not would be a good option if they ever do decide to bring them back to game play for good

But there is a slight follow up problem to streamers/youtubers in that people would want the challenger's to be playing with them and these are super distracting to players of these sorts of elo's.

And we all know how Viewers of streams act when you don't do what they want.
Surely there is some way it can work out
I'm sure there is a way, but again i feel it should just be a matter of on in norms and off in ranked, it makes it a lot more simple.

Could make it how if you don't have an icon you can't see them and if you have an icon yourself you can see yours and others that have the icons so the people that don't want them on they just need to not put the icon on.
If  they makes sense :/
I feel it should just be turned on in norms, and off in ranked.
